title: The updated new client beta still doesn't have this FEATURE
body: The updated clien beta update still does not have the features to display the number of wins for normal games such as "Classic" and "ARAM". However, it only shows ranked stats ._. This is pretty annoying to some players who don't play ranked at all, those only play normal games but still the new client doesn't update the feature to check your normal games' no. of wins and other stats like the old client does. Please looking forward to fix this Riot games!

replies.body: y, I hate that too. I played this game for 5 years and the champion level is new too. This way my profil looks like I am a complete noob, because I haven't played that mch over the last year and haven't played rank for a while. Additionally I don't get why it is missing, because there is more than enough unused space in the profil page.
